price: Na akikutakeni hayo na kukushikilieni mtafanya ubakhili, na atatoa undani wa chuki zenu.
arabic: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ
footnotes: Akikutakeni na akakushikilieni basi nyinyi mtafanya uchoyo, na chuki zenu zitaonekana kwa mnavyo yapenda mali.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in yasalkumūhā fayuḥ'fikum tabkhalū wayukh'rij aḍghānakum
translations: He were to ask you for it
